column4: my xorg.conf Screen section has only 1024x768 as a res but X runs only in 800x600 and the system > preferences > Screen Resolution tool only has 800x600
if it's not there, you have to add it
it is there in the xorg.conf.. only res.  but the desktop utility only has 640 and 800
try doing a ctrl + alt + "+"(on the num pad)
post the screen section of your xorg.conf in #flood
that is exactly as the install set it up
yes.  do you have a graphics card?
you want to see the graphics card section?
i was wondering if you might have to install the drivers for it.  but it seems you have integrated video
You need to set your refresh rate values:  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=29514&highlight=resolution
